TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IServerChannelSink implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSinkBase

summary.span: 提供用於安全性和傳輸接收的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used for security and transport sinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通道接收提供外掛程式點，以允許存取基礎訊息通過通道，以及使用的傳輸機制將訊息傳送至遠端物件的資料流。Channel sinks provide a plug-in point that allows access to the underlying messages flowing through the channel as well as the stream used by the transport mechanism to send messages to a remote object. 通道接收鏈結中的通道接收提供者，連結在一起，訊息是序列化和傳輸之前，這個接收鏈結流經通道的所有訊息。Channel sinks are linked together in a chain of channel sink providers, and all channel messages flow through this chain of sinks before the message is serialized and transported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何實作介面。The following code example illustrates an implementation of the interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/serversink.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/serversink.cs#60)] 請參閱介面對應的伺服器接收提供者實作的範例文件。See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding server sink provider implementation.

permission.span: 針對使用基礎結構程式碼執行作業。

span.span: for operating with infrastructure code.
Demand value: ; Permission value:

summary.span: 從非同步 (Asynchronous) 傳送的方法呼叫，要求回應的目前接收中的處理。

span.span: Requests processing from the current sink of the response from a method call sent asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `state`參數會包含已推入通道接收堆疊，而且與目前接收相關聯的資訊。The `state` parameter contains information that was pushed onto the channel sink stack and associated with the current sink. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CPP/commontransportkeys.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/CS/commontransportkeys.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CommonTransportKeys#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CommonTransportKeys/VB/commontransportkeys.vb#1)]

summary.span: 要求來自目前接收的訊息處理。

span.span: Requests message processing from the current sink.

returns.span: 狀態值，提供訊息如何處理的相關資訊。

span.span: A status value that provides information about how message was processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Proxy 的工作是將轉換成 message 物件在其上叫用方法呼叫。The job of a proxy is to convert a method call invoked on it into a message object. 此訊息物件，它會實作介面中，從用戶端到伺服器端傳遞藉由叫用訊息接收物件。This message object, which implements the interface, is passed from the client end to the server end by invoking on message sink objects. 訊息接收鏈結在一起，因為每個訊息接收會負責呼叫上它已執行其工作之後的下一個訊息接收。Message sinks are chained together in the sense that every message sink is responsible for calling on the next message sink after it has performed its work. 比方說，同步處理相關訊息接收，可能會造成鎖定來取得或釋放，並再委派進一步的下游訊息接收。For instance, a synchronization-related message sink can cause a lock to be acquired or released, and then delegated further to the downstream message sink.

exception.span: 立即呼叫端沒有基礎結構使用權限。
